thread.section_title: iMazing Bewertungen | Kundenbewertungen von iMazing | imazing.com
thread.title: JSteph

author: JSteph
title: JSteph
text:
I have a MacBook Air which after updating the OS, that I held out doing for some time, I found some disadvantages - such as ease of doing a complete system backup of my iphone.
I have yet to use all the features included with Imazing, but it does what it says with a very user friendly design. It has multiple options for how you want your files transferred and backed up which is nice - some information I want in the csv format, others a pdf is just fine.
When I had a question that I really anticipated was too late to inquire about - I thought I missed the opportunity for the offered coupon at purchase and the student discount - the customer service was blindingly fast, personable, and accommodating.
I am so glad I found this great product and without a high cost. I have been looking for months now to just do some text message transfers, and I even tried a few other softwares which I almost immediately removed.
Thank you!
Stephanie
